japanese: のぞいてたのか……？
english: Were you peeking…?

japanese: のぞいてたんでしょ……？/エッジのエッチ！
english: You were peeking, right...? /Edge's H!

japanese: は……そ、そうですか。/なんだかそれはそれで、/残念な話ですが……。
english: W-well… I see. /That's unfortunate in its own way...

japanese: は、はい……/してませんけど？
english: Y-yes.../I haven't though?

japanese: は、はい……。
english: Y-yes...

japanese: は、はいですぅ……。
english: Y-yes...

japanese: は、はい！？
english: Y-yes!?

japanese: は、ははは、そうですか？/まぁ、ふだんあまり絵などは/描かないですから……。
english: H-haha, is that so? /Well, I don't usually draw pictures...

japanese: は、犯人は…………/俺なんだぁ！！
english: T-the culprit is…/me!！

japanese: は、犯人は…………/私なのよぉ！！
english: T-the culprit is…/me!！

japanese: はぁ……
english: Sigh…

japanese: はぁ……/今日も一日、大変だったな。/楽しかったけど。
english: Sigh…/Today was tough again. /But it was fun.

japanese: はぁ……/今日も一日、大変だったわね。/楽しかったけど。
english: Sigh…/Today was tough again. /But it was fun.

japanese: はぁ……、/そうなんですけどねぇ……。
english: Sigh…/that's how it is ...

japanese: はぁ……。/（そういうものかしら？）
english: Sigh…/(Is that how it is?)

japanese: はぁ……。/（そういうものかなぁ？）
english: Sigh…/(Is that how it is?)

japanese: はぁい、バツ！/……あ、お母さんも/ご一緒だったんですか。
english: Hey, Batsu！/…Ah, your mother is here too?

japanese: はぁい、ロイ。/何か探してるの？
english: Hey, Roy. /Looking for something?

japanese: はぁい、将馬。/なんだかヒマそうね。
english: Hey, Shoma. /You look bored.

japanese: はぁい、恭介。/今日も見回りなの？/せっかくの学園祭なのに大変よね。
english: Hey, Kyosuke. /Patrolling again?/It's tough during the festival.

japanese: はぁはぁ……響子先生。/ちゃんと骨格標本、/届けておきましたから。
english: Huff huff... Kyoko-sensei./I delivered the skeleton specimen.

japanese: はい……/く…ろう……/九郎……さま…………
english: Yes.../K...uro... /Kuro-sama...

japanese: はい……/なんか怖そうな人が/受け取ってくれましたけど……
english: Yes.../A scary-looking person received it ...

japanese: はい……。
english: Yes...

japanese: はい、バツ。/ちゃんと届けておいたわよ。
english: Yes, Batsu. /I delivered it properly.

japanese: はい、先生。/たしかにお預かりしました。
english: Yes, sensei./I've received it.

japanese: はい、先生。/確かにお預かりします。
english: Yes, sensei./I'll receive it.

japanese: はい、先生！！
english: Yes, sensei!！

japanese: はいですぅ！/これはスゴイですよぉ！
english: Yes!/This is amazing!

japanese: はいですぅ！　ラケットで討ちもらしても、/トドメのボールがあれば/相手が逃げても安心ですからぁ！
english: Yes! Even if you miss with the racket,/with a finishing ball, /you're safe if they dodge!

japanese: はいはい、わかってるよ……。
english: Yes yes, I understand...

japanese: はい！
english: Yes!

japanese: はい！　先生！！
english: Yes! Sensei!！

japanese: はい？
english: Yes?

japanese: はじまっちまった！/どうする？
english: It's started！/What do we do?

japanese: はじまっちゃった！/どうしよう？
english: It's started！/What do we do?

japanese: はじめから、!0を/誘えばよかったよ。
english: Should've invited !0/from the start.

japanese: はずれ……。/プロレス大会、飛び入りで参加しようと/したんだけど、なんか断られてさ。
english: Miss…/I tried to join the wrestling tournament /on the fly, but was turned down.

japanese: はずれ！/ありゃダメだよ。/プールで金魚すくいなんて、ムチャだって。
english: Miss！ That won't work. /Goldfish scooping in a pool is crazy.

japanese: はは……大丈夫ですよ。/響子先生こそ、学園祭の間ぐらい/ちゃんと身体を休めて下さいね。
english: Haha… I'm fine./Kyoko-sensei, please rest properly during the festival.

japanese: はは、冗談ですってば！/またあとで、先生！！
english: Haha, I'm joking！/See you later, sensei!!

japanese: ははぁ……なるほど。/で、自分では持っていきにくい、と。/しょうがないな……わかったよ。
english: Haha… I see. /And it's hard for you to take yourself./Can't be helped... got it.

japanese: ははぁ……なるほど。/で、自分では持っていきにくい、と。/しょうがないわね……わかったわ。
english: Haha… I see. /And it's hard for you to take yourself./Can't be helped... got it.

japanese: ははっ、バツらしいな。
english: Haha, that's so Batsu.

japanese: ははっ、確かに。/じゃあ俺も、もう少し羽目を外そうかな！
english: Haha, true. /Then I'll let loose a bit more too!

japanese: ははは、そんないいものじゃないです。/まだ修行の身だったころ、父親に/山籠もりさせられましてね……。
english: Hahaha, it's not that good. /When I was still training, my father made me do mountain seclusion ...

japanese: はははバカいっちゃイカンよ、/私にだって、ははは……はぁ。
english: Hahaha, don't be silly, /even I ... hahaha... sigh.

japanese: は！？/そ、そうよね。全然よくないわ！/（何の話かわからないけど……）
english: What！? /Y-yes. Not good at all!/(I don't know what we're talking about ...)

japanese: ひ〜なた。/……どうしちゃったの？/ボーッとして。
english: Hinata. /…What's wrong?/You're spacing out.

japanese: ひとつだけ……、/できる方法がひとつだけあるぜ……。
english: There's only one way…/only one way to do it...

japanese: ひとりでもいいじゃない/ゆりかさんがいるじゃない/私が一緒にいてあげる
english: Going alone is fine /Yurika-san is there/I'll be with you

japanese: ひとりでもいいじゃないか/ゆりかさんがいるじゃないか/俺が一緒にいてやる
english: Going alone is fine /Yurika-san is there/I'll be with you

japanese: ひなた……
english: Hinata…

japanese: ひなた……/こんな所に一人でどうしたの？
english: Hinata…/What are you doing here alone?

japanese: ひなた……その男の子って、/もしかして……
english: Hinata… that boy,/could it be...

japanese: ひなたか……/こんな所に一人でどうしたんだ？
english: Hinata…/What are you doing here alone?

japanese: ひなたから/!c02届け物『ケーキ皿』!c07をあずかった/!c01家庭科室!c07に届けよう！
english: Received delivery 'Cake Plate' from Hinata, /deliver to Home Economics Room!

japanese: ひなたって、/いつもヘアバンドしてるけど、/髪をおろす時ってどんな時なの？
english: Hinata always wears a hairband, but,/when does she let her hair down?

japanese: ひなたって、/いつもヘアバンドしてるけど、/髪をおろす時ってどんな時なんだ？
english: Hinata always wears a hairband, but,/when does she let her hair down?

japanese: ひなたのツープラトン技/!c03『ガッツ百倍』!c07を覚えた！
english: Learned Hinata's Two-Platoon/　!c03'GUTS Hundredfold'!c07!

japanese: ひなた！/俺にもひなたのツープラトン技を/教えてくれよ。
english: Hinata！/Teach me Hinata's Two-Platoon technique.

japanese: ひなた！/私にひなたのツープラトン技を/教えてちょうだい！
english: Hinata！/Teach me Hinata's Two-Platoon technique!

japanese: ひゃぁっ！！/あ、ああ……。/がんばって……。
english: Eek!！/A-ah ... /do your best ...

japanese: ひょっとして……、/「金魚すくい」ですか？
english: Could it be.../'Goldfish scooping'?

japanese: ふ〜ん……/じゃ、俺とか……どうスか？
english: Hmm.../Then what about me ...?

japanese: ふ〜ん……/じゃ、私、立候補しちゃおうかな？
english: Hmm.../Then should I run?

japanese: ふ〜ん……、/モテモテだわね、将馬クン。
english: Hmm.../You're popular, Shoma-kun.

japanese: ふ〜ん……、/モテモテですなー、将馬サン。
english: Hmm.../You're popular, Shoma-san.

japanese: ふ〜ん……。/どうもありがと。/参考になりました……。
english: Hmm.../Thanks./That was helpful ...

japanese: ふ〜ん……。/悪いな、手間かけさせて。/参考になりました……。
english: Hmm.../Sorry for the trouble. /That was helpful ...

japanese: ふ〜ん……なんだか、/先生の意外な一面を見ちゃったな……。
english: Hmm... somehow I saw, /sensei's unexpected side ...

japanese: ふ〜ん、じゃ試しに/口説いてみてよ。/俺を女だと思って。
english: Hmm, then try flirting. /Think of me as a girl.

japanese: ふ〜ん、なんか/心ココにあらずって感じだな。。/野球のことになると、夢中だからなぁ。
english: Hmm, your mind seems elsewhere…/When it comes to baseball, you're absorbed.

japanese: ふ〜ん、なんだか/心ココにあらずって感じね。。/野球のことになると、もう夢中なんだから。
english: Hmm, your mind seems elsewhere…/When it comes to baseball, you're so absorbed.

japanese: ふ〜ん、なんだか流さんみたいだな。/実は流さんが、泳ぎを仕込んだとか？
english: Hmm, like Nagare-san. /Did Nagare-san teach you to swim?

japanese: ふ〜ん、なんだか流先輩みたいね。/実は流先輩が、泳ぎを仕込んだとか？
english: Hmm, like Nagare-senpai./Did Nagare-senpai teach you to swim?

japanese: ふ〜ん、将馬ももう２年生だもんねぇ。
english: Hmm, Shoma is already a second-year.

japanese: ふ〜ん、相変わらずだな、二人とも。
english: Hmm, same as always, both of you.

japanese: ふ〜ん、相変わらずね、二人とも。
english: Hmm, same as always, both of you.

japanese: ふ〜ん、ＯＫ。/やっとくよ。
english: Hmm, OK./I'll do it.

japanese: ふ〜ん、ＯＫ。/やっとくわ。
english: Hmm, OK./I'll do it.

japanese: ふぅ……/そんなに作りたけりゃ、今度いつか/誰かの為に作ってあげればいいじゃない。
english: Phew…/If you want to make it that much, make it for someone next time.

japanese: ふぅ……/そんなに作りたけりゃ、今度いつか/誰かの為に作ってあげればいいじゃないか。
english: Phew…/If you want to make it that much, make it for someone next time.

japanese: ふぅ……、そろそろ私も/仕事に戻ります。/!0君、どうもありがとう。
english: Phew… I should return to work soon./　!0-kun, thank you.

japanese: ふぅ……ワザとらしい芝居は終わりか？/これでも僕は忙しいんだがな。
english: Phew… Is the obvious act over? /I'm busy too, you know.

japanese: ふぅ……真剣に話した自分が/馬鹿らしく思えてくるよ。/失礼。
english: Phew… I feel foolish for speaking seriously. /Excuse me.

japanese: ふぅん……/!0もそう思ってるんだ。/よく判った。じゃあね。
english: Hmm...　!0 thinks so too. /I understand. See you.

japanese: ふぅん……/じゃ、せめて私だけでも手伝うわ。/見て見ぬふりはできないしね。
english: Hmm.../Then at least I'll help. /I can't pretend not to see.

japanese: ふぅん……。/先輩は、大人なんですね。
english: Hmm.../Senpai is an adult.

japanese: ふぅん……それにしても、/どうして委員長一人なの？
english: Hmm... even so, why is Chairperson alone?

japanese: ふぅん……それにしても、/どうして委員長一人なんだ？
english: Hmm... even so, why is Chairperson alone?

japanese: ふぅん……そんな時間からなんて、/大変だな。
english: Hmm... starting from that time, tough.

japanese: ふぅん、がんばってるんだ、将馬。
english: Hmm, you're working hard, Shoma.

japanese: ふぅん、がんばってるんだな、将馬。
english: Hmm, you're working hard, Shoma.

japanese: ふぅん。/なんなら、またいつか見せてあげるよ。/いつもと違う私を、ね！
english: Hmm./If you want, I'll show you again./A different side of me!

japanese: ふぅん。/ま、見かけたら/買いに行ってあげよっかな。
english: Hmm./Well, if I see it, I'll go buy it for you.

japanese: ふぅん。/ま、見かけたら/買いに行ってやるとするかな。
english: Hmm./Well, if I see it, I'll go buy it.

japanese: ふぅーん……。/誰がその衣装を決めたの？
english: Hmm.../Who decided on that costume?

japanese: ふぅーん。/そうして優しい顔してると、/アキラも、「聖女」って感じだな。
english: Hmm./When you make that gentle face, Akira looks like a 'saint'.

japanese: ふぅーん。/そうして優しい顔してると、/アキラも、「聖女」って感じだね。
english: Hmm./When you make that gentle face, Akira looks like a 'saint'.
